mapper.insert: insert into PMImage (createdate,modifydate,object_type,object_id,path,name,old_name,size,type,status) values (#{createdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifydate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{objectType, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{objectId, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{path, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oldName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{size, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status, jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: update PMImage set id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT},createdate = #{createdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},modifydate = #{modifydate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},object_type = #{objectType, jdbcType=INTEGER},object_id = #{objectId, jdbcType=BIGINT},path = #{path, jdbcType=VARCHAR},name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},old_name = #{oldName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},size = #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER},type = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},status = #{status, jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id}
